description:
This wash-in treatment restores the durable water-repellent finish of all waterproof-breathable laminates and coatings. Pre-wash your items with NikwaxTech Wash or another mild soap, then add this treatment in a washing machine.

  • Safe for GORE-TEX®, Entrant®, most other waterproof-breathables, and other woven fabrics
  • Non-aerosol, non-flammable contents
  • 300ml bottle treats two garments
name: Nikwax TX.Direct Wash-In Waterproofer 300ml
